id.title: List Id
id.description: The domain of the bot list. Matches the file name.

added.title: List added timestamp
added.description: Unix timestamp for when the list was added to BotBlock.

name.title: List name
name.description: The displayed name of the list.

url.title: List URL
url.description: The main URL to access the bot list.

icon.title: List icon
icon.description: A URL for an icon for the list.

language.title: List language(s)
language.description: The languages the list has support for.

display.title: List display status
display.description: A flag for if the list is displayed on BotBlock, with 0 = hidden, 1 = displayed.

defunct.title: List defunct status
defunct.description: A flag for if the list is known to be defunct, with 0 = active, 1 = defunct.

discord_only.title: List Discord-only status
discord_only.description: A flag for if the list holds Discord bots only, with 0 = includes non-Discord, 1 = Discord-only.

description.title: List description
description.description: The displayed description of the list.

api_docs.title: List API docs URL
api_docs.description: The URL to the API docs for the list, if known.

api_post.title: List API guild count POST endpoint
api_post.description: The endpoint URL for posting a bot's guild count to the list, if known, with `:id` as placeholder for bot Id.

api_field.title: List API count field name
api_field.description: The field name for guild count when posting a bot's guild count to the list, if known.

api_shard_id.title: List API shard Id field name
api_shard_id.description: The field name for shard Id when posting a bot's guild count to the list, if known.

api_shard_count.title: List API shard count field name
api_shard_count.description: The field name for shard count when posting a bot's guild count to the list, if known.

api_shards.title: List API shards field name
api_shards.description: The field name for shards when posting a bot's guild count to the list, if known.

api_get.title: List API bot GET endpoint
api_get.description: The endpoint URL for getting a bot from the list, if known, with `:id` as placeholder for bot Id.

api_all.title: List API all bots GET endpoint
api_all.description: The endpoint URL for getting all bots from the list, if known.

view_bot.title: List view bot URL
view_bot.description: The URL to the view a bot on the list, if known, with `:id` as placeholder for bot Id.

bot_widget.title: List bot widget URL
bot_widget.description: The URL to get a bot widget from the list, if known, with `:id` as placeholder for bot Id.

content.title: List notice content
content.description: The displayed notice content for the list, if any.

owners.title: List owners
owners.description: Names of the list owners, if known.

discord.title: List Discord invite URL
discord.description: The URL invite for the list's Discord server, if known.

features.title: List features.
features.description: A list of feature Ids the bot list has. Ids must be valid feature Ids.

items.title: Feature Id
items.description: The Id of an existing feature.
